product_name: Mountain Hardwear Mountain Tech Jacket - Men's
long_description: A Mountain Hardwear original, the Mountain Tech jacket is made from windproof fleece and reinforced with soft-shell paneling. This durable, weather-resistant jacket is a great backcountry choice. Fleece body is breathable and windproof; this versatile long-lasting fabric has an abrasion-resistant exterior and a breathable membrane that lets heat and vapor escape. Soft-shell paneling adds durability and weather resistance. Internal windflap keeps cold wind from penetrating; Micro-Chamois(TM)-lined chin guard eliminates zipper chafe. Pit zips allow ventilation and cooling options. Dual hem drawcords provide quick fit adjustments. Mountain Hardwear Mountain Tech jacket has 2 zip handwarmer pockets and a zip chest pocket.
short_description: A Mountain Hardwear original, the Mountain Tech jacket is made from windproof fleece and reinforced with soft-shell paneling. This durable, weather-resistant jacket is a great backcountry choice.
